channel.title: Error Connecting with my Client
channel.description: Well I turn my server online. IT IS ONLINE I even check runelocus and it says so. So I try connecting using my client (Blurrs) I have only eddited the IP in GUI.java but I still can't connect. Should I connect to localhost and just have my players connect to the IP or is it my client?

item.title: Error Connecting with my Client
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

You should connect through localhost.

Your players should use your IP (no-ip) that you use.

Read full topic
